title: "Throwback" featured game mode
body:
Can we pretty pls have a Throwback game mode with all the old items that got deleted, like Runic Bulwark, Force of Nature, DFG or Sword of the Divine? I wanna play SotD {{champion:54}} , that sh!t was fun.

Otherwise just bring back Sword of the Divine, but a throwback game mode would be heaps more fun imo.

replies.body:
Yeah Riot took a lot of fun out of the game for competitive play and for making spectate more interesting.

Even though it's still incredibly imbalanced and will probably never be balanced.
